message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product that I think you'll be interested in.  I'm asking $20000 for it, but I'm open to reasonable offers.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints.  While $12000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $17000.  This is a significant discount from my original asking price and represents a fair price for the value you'll be getting. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Can you meet me at this price?
